de.engehausen.treemap.swt

Class TreeMapMouseController<N>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.engehausen.treemap.swt.TreeMapMouseController<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the type of node of the model used for the tree map

    public class TreeMapMouseController<N>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class registers mouse and mouse motion listeners with the tree map to be able to handle desired mouse events (i.e mouse move for tooltips & highlighting, mouse released and so on).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TreeMapMouseController(TreeMap<N> aTreeMap)
      Creates a controller object that will register the mouse and mouse move listeners to the treemap.

    • Method Summary

      void mouseUp(MouseEvent mouseevent)

      • TreeMapMouseController

        public TreeMapMouseController(TreeMap<N> aTreeMap)
        Creates a controller object that will register the mouse and mouse move listeners to the treemap.
        Parameters:
        aTreeMap - the tree map used by the mouse controller, must not be null
